name: The Unforgettable Adventures With Dr Hans
name_original: The Unforgettable Adventures With Dr Hans
description:
Note : This is my submission to the Game Zanga 9 game jam so some parts were left out to be able to submit it on time.

The Unforgettable Adventures With Doctor Hans is a game where you find yourself in an universe that is not familiar because of an irregularity in the cosmic flows. Getting you back from where you came would've been easy if everyone in this universe can only move while hugging the wall. Nevertheless, you have to help Dr Hans navigate through the buildings by using whatever is around you and restore the balance in the universe and save it from the grave dangers such irregularities could cause.
